title: Good service

text:
Dari pertama sampai di lobby hotel terkesima dg pelayanan staff yg begitu ramah dg seragam yg begitu santai (seperti seragam baseball), staff semua sangat inisiatif&cekatan. Ruangan kamar lumayan luas dg 2 kamar mandi di luar dan dalam kamar tidur, ruang makan dg kulkas, kompor dan microwave sampai dg mesin pembuat kopi&roti panggang dan lengkap dg alat masak serta alat makan. Ruang nonton tv cukup luas dengan sofa yg nyaman dan pemandangan yg bagus ke arah kota. Ruang tidur beserta kasur bantal yg nyaman, kamar mandi yg lengkap dg bathub, pancuran dan hairdryer serta yg tak terlupakan surprise bday berupa tulisan pada kaca lemari di kamar tidur dan kue yg dibawakan para staff dg nyanyian ulang tahun... Sangat berkesan sekali.

Oia tidak lupa boks bayi yg diantarkan krn pada saat itu saya membawa bayi (request). 

Oia hotel ini pun memiliki 3 kolam renang (anak, dewasa, air hangat) dan tempat bermain outdoor. Resto yg nyaman dan variasi makanan yg banyak.

Terima kasih ya Tabitha dan team kalian luar biasa. 

RA Premiere Suite terlengkap dan ternyaman.. Cocok utk kumpul dg keluarga dan pasangan.. Akan kembali menginap lg dalam waktu dekat, yeay.

title: Ra premier simatupang

text:
Bagi yang sudah lama tidak bepergian, hotel ini pilihan tepat untuk mendapatkan pengalaman menginap yang menyenangkan. 

Beberapa hari sebelum kedatangan sy menghubungi ig untuk menanyakan apakah bisa request birthday surprise dan akhirnya dgn tambahan 150k sy mendapatkan dekorasi tambahan sesuai waktu yg sy inginkan. 

Awal check in agak menunggu karena ramai tetapi frontliners menjelaskan perkiraan berapa menit menunggu dengan ramah sehingga tidak merasa digantung. 

Petugas yg ditemui semua ramah dan helpful mulai dari guest relation yg menghubungi sebelum kedatangan, security, frontdesk, cleaning service sampai yg di resto/pool juga tdk ada yg tdk ramah. 

Untuk yg bepergian bersama keluarga / long stay akan lebih baik memilih tipe kmr studio executive krn sudah lengkap dgn kompor listrik, kulkas, microwave dan utensilsnya. Juga terdapat setrika+meja setrikaannya. Hari dryer di laci, air panas lancar dan flush wc menggunakan air daur ulang. 

Gym dan pool dpt dipakai 24 jam menggunakan kartu akses kamar dan terdapat kolam jacuzzi, terdapat kids playground & kids pool jg. 

Menu saat breakfast cukup bervariasi dan di pojok ada gelato dengan tambahan charge 25k/scoop. Additional breakfast 125k/prson. 

Dekorasi b'day surprise juga diluar expektasi sangat bagus dan menyenangkan, Terima kasih utk team RA premier, next pasti akan kembali menginap di sini

text:
Menyesal nginep cuma sehari :"")
Hotel nya bersih banget dan sangat nyaman dan affordable. Semua staff bener bener ramah, service nya juga bagus. Nongkrong di Restaurant nya juga enak kaya lagi hang out di coffee shop. title: Great Experience

text:
Saya menginap satu malam dengan harga spesial dari agoda untuk tipe kamar deluxe. Dimasa pandemi covid 19 hotel ini menyediakan hand sanitizer ditiap titik dan alat sensor tangan untuk cek suhu ketika masuk.Saya kagum dengan keramahan staff nya. Bellman dan security sangat sigap dan ramah, proses check in yang cepat. Staff reception sangat informatif serta ramah. Kamarnya wah banget. Ada mini kitchen nya  di kamar deluxe yang saya tempati. Ada tempat cuci piring, kompor listrik, kulkas, toaster, kettle, dan ada iron & ironing board dalam lemari. Kopi, teh, gula, creamer semua lengkap. Amenitis di kamar mandi lengkap dan disediakan serba 2 pcs. Sandal hotel juga tersedia 2 pasang. Tersedia meja dan kursi kerja selain 2 bangku dan meja lain disampingnya. 
 Kolam renang untuk anak dan dewasanya sangat bersih. Airnya jernih. Dilengkapi dengan kolam jacuzzi namunn sayangnya waktu kita berenang kolam jacuzzi nya tidak hangat. Ada gym dan kids play ground disamping kolam renang.
Untuk keseluruhan dari pelayanan yang diberikan sangat memuaskan seperti hotel bintang 5. 
Semoga kualitas pelayanan yang baik bisa terus dipertahankan.
title: Sangat memuaskan

title: Nice

text:
Kamar yang luas dan bersih lengkap dengan kitchen set (kulkas, kompor dengan peralatan masak, microwave, toaster, coffee maker, dolce coffee capsule).  untuk yang suka masak, tidak perlu kemana-mana untuk  makan, bisa menyiapkan sendiri masakan simple.
Stay di suite room, kamar tidur terpisah dengan sitting room - kitchen, sehingga kalau untuk perjalanan bisnis dan ada tamu bisa di ruangan ini  dengan toilet terpisah dari kamar mandi yang di kamar, tidak mengganggu privacy.
Kolam renangnya bagus dengan salah satu sisinya dari kaca.
Pelayanannya luar biasa.  Para staff  ramah, sopan dan sangat tanggap.  Termasuk menyediakan handuk setelah berenang.
Terima kasih RA Simatupang.
title: The best and the most comfortable place to stay in south Jakarta

text:
Selama menginap di Ra , para staff service melayani dgn baik, ramah, sopan dan sangat tanggap, fasilitas kamar lengkap dengan WiFi yang stabil, meja makan, ruang duduk, dapur (microwave, kulkas, coffeemaker, alat masak, toaster, bottled mineral water, cofee capsule dr dolce) yang bersih dan nyaman dgn gaya konsep modern minimalis. Bed super nyaman, lengkap dengan cermin luas dan besar di sisi lemari. Swimming poolnya juga tampil keren dgn salah 1 sisi-nya berdesain see-thru glasses. Oke untuk bikin video renang2 cantik . Juga terdapat tempat gym dan taman bermain anak di samping taman.
Saya rasa Ra adalah best hotel selama staycation di daerah Jakarta Selatan dengan harga kamar per malam nya yg sangat affordable. Saya menginap di kamar suite excecutive sampai extend dua malam. Tadinya rencana hanya book satu malam saja. . Ohya saya juga sempat menikmati sunset  yg sangat indah dari balkon teras hotel yg berada di ujung kamar bagian luar. Overall merasa cukup puas dengan pelayanan dari Ra. Fasilitas sangat sesuai dgn harga yg ditawarkan. Pastinya saya akan merekomendasikan hotel ini ke teman2 dan kerabat terdekat saya. Terimakasih ya, Ra Hotel Simatupang untuk fasilitas dan pelayanannya. Sukses selalu untuk para staff dan karyawan hotel yang bertugas! 😊
title: Best Place To StayCation Around Jakarta Selatan

text: Kamar sangat rapih dan modern dan lokasi sangat strategis. Saya tidak lupakan juga dengan layanan yang diberikan oleh masing-masing staff. Walaupun ada sedikit kendala pada kartu kamar tidak terbaca diawal check-in.

title: Sangat menyenangkan

text:
Staycation in here for 4D3N while WFH. I love staying here, love the room. 
Sangat bagus dan nyaman. Dan yang paling saya sukai adalah meja kerja, membuat liburan dan bekerja sangat nyaman. Kamar sangat bersih dengan tipe studio (terdapat kompor dalam kamar). Staff sangat ramah dan melayani sangat baik.
title: Amazing staycation

text:
Jika anda membutuhkan tempat menginap untuk Shortstay maupun Longstay, Ra adalah tempat yang tepat. Fasilitas di dalam kamar maupun di hotel ini sangatlah lengkap.
Kedatangan kami di hotel ini di tengah mewabahnya virus corona, namun semua orang di Ra berusaha keras untuk membuat kami merasa nyaman.
Kami sangat menikmati kenyamanan dan perhatian, serta layanan yang luar biasa. Meskipun properti ini terletak di tengah pusat kota Jakarta Selatan namun tetap terasa privacy nya.
Kami pasti akan kembali ke Ra
title: Beyond expectation!

text:
Menginap di hotel RA ini cukup bagus dan nyaman, selain harganya sangat terjangkau kamarnya pun luas, saya memesan 1 bedroom disana bagian ruang tv sofa nya besar bisa dijadikan kasur, perlengkapan dapur juga cukup lengkap, kamar mandi 2 ada untuk tamu dan pribadi dlm kamar..
Yang disayangkan adalah pintu kamar pribadi di 1 bedroom tidak bisa di kunci jd tidak ada privacy jika ada tamu, dan tidak ada kamar yg bisa smoking..

title: Very good place

text:
Tempat yang bagus dan di rekomendasikan untuk menginap disekitar Jakarta Selatan (Cilandak) untuk perjalanan bisnis dan keluarga. 
Dekat kemana, dengan pusat bisnis dan pusat perdagangan. 
Good servis, dari check in sampai dgn check out.
title: Ra Simatupang

text: Suka dengan hotel ini,,,super,,, sy di upgrade ke suite room,,, terima kasih banyak. Ada kolam anak, ada permainan di samping kolam.... Gym bagus alat nya cukup komplit. Staff ramah.Ra Premiere Simatupang.
title: Mr

text: Saya beserta anak dan suami saya menginap disini untuk liburan akhir pekan, kebetulan pada hari Minggunya suami saya berulang tahun. Pada saat check in saya minta tolong dengan pihak hotel untuk diadakan "surprise"  kecil2an. Kamar yang saya dapat Executive Suite. wow luas banget dengan kamar kecil kering 1 dan kamar mandi di dalam yang luas 1. Overall kamarnya sangat memuaskan, ada Toaster, ada microwave. ada kompor ada Kulkas beserta piring2 dan pisaunya. lengkap deh. Besok paginya kami turun kebawah untuk breakfast, dan surprise!! ada kue kecil dan semua tim restoran bernyanyi untuk suami saya, senang sekali. Fasilitas di hotelnya pun lengkap untuk area bermainnya ada playground kecil dan mainan2nya, ada pool beserta jacuzzi nya yang katanya sih open 24 jam, tapi saya belum pernah nyobain berenang malem2 sih, hehe. Ada little gym. Semua nya lengkap.  I will comeback for sure :)
title: Had a wonderful experience

text:
RA Premiere Simatupang
Hotelnya recomended banget..
Receptionist nya baik dan ramah  
Nyaman,Aman,view nya juga bagus..
Cocok banget buat ajak keluarga liburan sambil menikmati fasilitasnya.
Harga nya juga terjangkau..
title: RECOMENDED

text:
Tempat nyaman, gak nyangka ada alat panggang roti, kompor, panci, alat makan..bahkan pisau 😁 sangat direkomendasikan untuk bawa anak2 🏨
Menuju lokasi hotel sempat terlewat dan harus putar balik. But overall is good..
title: Review menginap di Ra Premiere Simatupang Hotel

text: Kamar cukup bersih, AC dingin, hanya saja kamar mandi yang tidak ada shower (hanya pancuran seperti di mall) untuk bilas sehabis buang air kecil. Pelayanannya bagus dan staff cukup ramah. Sempat kehabisan handuk saat berenang
title: Staycation semalam

text: Ruangannya bersih, ada dapur yang pastinya bisa menghemat uang makan, tempat kerja yang cukup nyaman dan luas untuk laptop, kamar yang sangat nyaman, kulkas untuk menaruh minuman agar tetap dingin, 5 stars for this room
title: Very satisfied

text: hotel lumayan bagus,posisi dekat dengan jalan raya. karyawan juga baik dan ramah.hanya saja penerangan lampu diarea depan kurang terang kelihatan gelap,jadi saran ditambah lagi untuk lampunya. terima kasih Simatupang

title: wedding anniversarry

title: second home

text: saya menginap 2 malam untuk keperluan bisnis, Hotel yang nyaman, ruangannya bersih dan sangat nyaman, dilengkapi dengan mini kitchen, tempat tidurnya nyaman sekali, posisi yang dekat dengan kantor memudahkan saya untuk bermobilisasi. hanya sarapan yang tidak termasuk dalam harga harga kamar (meskipun saya booking langsung di tempat). namun demikian hotel ini sepertinya akan menjadi langganan saya jika ke Jakarta.

owner_response.text:
Dear Ernest

Terima Kasih telah memilih Ra Simatupang sebagai tempat untuk beristirahat dan menginap selama di Jakarta.

Atas masukan  yang disampaikan, kami ucapkan terima kasih dan akan kami bahas bersama dengan tim untuk meningkatkan fasilitas yang ada di properti kami.

Residence kami baru dibuka pada bulan November 2015 dan dengan berjalannya waktu kami berusaha terus untuk meningkatkan pelayanan dan kualitas agar tingkat kepuasan tamu yang menginap dapat terpenuhi dengan baik.

Kami sangat mengutamakan kepentingan tamu dan akan mengakomodir kebutuhan para tamu kami dan harapan kami kedepan akan lebih baik. 

Kami mohon maaf atas ketidaknyamanan selama tinggal di Ra Simatupang dan semoga pada kunjungan berikutnya memberikan kesan yang baik .

Terima Kasih.

Nanang Setyawan
General Manager

text: Menurut saya, pelayanan okey. house keeping akan membersihkan kamar setiap pagi atau tinggal bilang setelah kita keluar dari kamar. title: Hotel dengan lingkungan strategis dan nyaman

owner_response.text:
Dear Arina

Terima Kasih telah memilih Ra Simatupang sebagai tempat untuk beristirahat dan menginap selama di Jakarta.

Konsep kami memang lebih kepada Service Apartment, dimana semua unit kami dilengkapi dengan perlengkapan dapur dan perlengkapannya. Sehingga setiap tamu yang memerlukan peralatan tersebut bisa menghubungi tim kami untuk disiapkan dan dikirim ke kamar. 
Dilengkapi pula dengan meja setrika, alat setrika dan peralatan pengaman lainnya.  

Tim housekeeping kami juga membersihkan kamar  secara rutin setiap harinya dan bisa disesuaikan dengan permintaan tamu. 

Untuk menu makan pagi kami memiliki fasilitas  Restaurant yang cukup terkenal di wilayah Jakarta Selatan yaitu KOI Restaurant, dimana restaurant resmi beroperasi di Ra Simatupang semenjak bulan Agustus 2017. 
Dengan adanya restaurant ini kami berharap bahwa menu makanan yang disajikan dengan harga tersebut dapat memenuhi selera para tamu kami.

Sekali lagi terima kasih atas komentar yang disampaikan, dan semoga pengalaman selama tinggal di Ra Simatupang memberikan kesan yang baik. 

Kami tunggu kehadirannya kembali di Ra Simatupang. 

Terima Kasih


Nanang Setaywan
General Manager

title: Not recommended

owner_response.text:
Selamat Malam Pak Oddie.

Sebelumnya kami ucapkan terima kasih sudah memilih Ra Residence sebagai salah satu alternatif akomodasi bapak selama di Jakarta.

Kami juga meminta maaf yang sebesar besarnya atas ketidak nyamanan yang timbul saat bapak tinggal di Residence kami

Untuk diketahui Ra Residence memiliki 6 tipe kamar dimana unit terkecil kita adalah tipe Studio yang memiliki luas 30 m2. Dan Unit ini kita set up sebagai Unit yang digunakan untuk Single Occupancy / 1 (satu ) orang tamu. 

sebenarnya unit ini juga masih cukup luas untuk 2 (orang) sehingga jika diperlukan tambahan kelengkapan kamar maka kami selalu siap 24 jam untuk melayani permintaan atau kebutuhan tambahan tamu tersebut,  kami akan berikan secara gratis dan sesuai dengan batas maksimal yang kami tentukan.

Untuk keterlambatan penambahan Handuk yang diminta  kami sudah lakukan pengecekan kepada staff kami dan sudah dilakukan TINDAKAN TEGAS dari Manajemen terhadap staff yang bertugas.

Kemudian untuk Menu Sarapan Pagi, kami sangat berterima kasih atas masukan yang disampaikan, sebagai informasi tambahan bahwa Residence kami baru beroperasi kurang dari 1 tahun sehingga masih banyak kekurangan yang perlu kami perbaiki, baik dari mutu, service serta  pelayanan. Dan Masukan yang Bapak sampaikan sangat membantu kami untuk memperbaiki apa-apa yang kurang buat tamu-tamu kami. 

Kami sangat berterima kasih atas masukan yang Bapak sampaikan dan semoga kedepan kami dapat memberikan lebih baik kepada tamu-tamu kami.

Semoga Bapak masih memilih Ra Residence sebagai prioritas akomodasi bapak. Kami tunggu kehadiran Bapak selanjutnya, apabila Bapak membutuhkan informasi lebih lanjut  silahkan menghubungi saya secara langsung, dengan senang hati saya akan membantu Bapak.  

Terima Kasih. 


Hormat kami.


Nanang Setyawan
General Manager Ra Residence
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Lokasi strategis, harga affordable, fasilitas mewah. Ga berharap banyak soal pelayanan krn reviewnya negatif, tapi ternyata oke lah, pelayanannya memang terkesan seperlunya, tapi lumayan cepet.

Ke citos bisa jalan kaki, atau bisa belanja bahan masakan di all fresh yg jaraknya ga nyampe 100meter, tempatnya agak didalem jadi ga berisik.

Fasilitas kamar:
- wifi kenceng di tiap kamar, dapur yg bisa pinjem alat makan dan masak upon request (tapi kena charge kalo mau nyalain kompor) lengkap dgn kulkas, microwave, toaster, sink, dan electric kettle.
- Kamar mandi shower dan hairdryer dlm kamar (sedikit ga nyaman krn air flush toilet bukan air baru jadi warnanya agak kuning). 
- Lemari dgn safe deposit box, senter, strikaan dan papannya
- meja kerja dengan port usb charger

Fasilitas hotel:
- kolam renang dewasa
- jacuzzi 
- kolam anak
- gym (bisa pinjem sepatu olahraga)
- playground
- personal key room yg hanya bisa dipake untuk menuju kamar sendiri
- parkir agak susah kalo penuh
- laundry room di basement

Cocok banget buat yg mau nyari weekend gateway.

Definitely would go back someday
title: Worth it

owner_response.text:
Selamat Malam Fadilah H

Sebelumnya kami ucapkan terima kasih sudah memilih Ra Residence sebagai salah satu alternatif akomodasi selama di Jakarta.

Residence kami memang memiliki konsep Go Green untuk membantu meningkatkan kualitas lingkungan, dimana air untuk keperluan kloset adalah menggunakan air "Recycle"  dan agak sedikit berwaran kuning, penggunaan air ini sangat membantu sekali untuk mengurangi  konsumsi air bersih yang digunakan untuk flushing. Air Recycle ini hanya digunakan di area tersebut, sedangkan untuk keperluan di wastafel, kitchen dan kamar mandi tetap kami menggunakan air bersih.

Semoga dengan lengkap nya peralatan dan alat-alat penunjang lainya yang  kami siapkan di kamar-kamar tersebut membuat pengalaman anda selama tinggal di Ra Residence menjadi sangat berkesan dan segala yang dibutuhkan saat tinggal di kamar tersebut dapat terpenuhi dengan baik pula.

Kami dengan senang hati menunggu kehadiran anda selanjutnya untuk tinggal bersama keluarga di Ra Residence.

Atas nama Manajemen kami ucapkan banyak terima kasih.


Nanang Setyawan
General Manager Ra Residence Jakarta

text:
Plus Value : 
1. Hotel Baru , dengan Konsep Cozy dan Private 
2. Fasilitas Cukup Memadai 
3. Ruang Kamar yang luas dan modern dilengkapi dengan dapur , dg konsep apartemen 

Suggestion : 
1. Mohon ditingkatkan koordinasi dan komunikasi antara pihak FO, reservation dan Sales . Dan Pelayanan lebih diutamakan , tata cara , sopan santun , hotel knowledgment , rules of the hotel 
2. Tolong lebih ditingkatkan service excellent (5-S) 
3. Ini kunjungan kami yang pertama , dan first impression yang kami dapat mengecewakan dalam segi pelayanan. 
4. Kami telah memesan kamar melalui sales kami Ms. Ika , yaitu 3 kamar connecting door Jauh sebelum long weekend tgl 5- 7 Mei 2016 untuk kolega kami dari luar kota. Dan permintaan untuk kamar connecting telah disetujui dan dibooked oleh Ms. Ika. 
5. in Fact , ketika kami check in , ternyata kamar yang telah kami pesan telah dijual kepada tamu lain , dan itu mengecewakan sekali. Ketika kami menanyakan bagaimana itu bisa terjadi apalagi kami sdh pesan seminggu sebelumnya .... Jawaban dari Mr. Bram petugas hotel saat itu (reservation team / FO ) menjawab " saya tidak tahu, tadi kamar  dibooked mendadak sore tadi oleh team sales" ( sekilas kami  berpikir adanya saling menyalahkan dan tidak ada tanggung jawab sama sekali) 
6. Petugas MOD tidak cepat tanggap akan hal tersebut , sehingga kami menghubungi Ms. Ika sales kami , dan terima kasih telah direspon dengan cepat dan No yang selalu aktif untuk kami hubungi meskipun Ms. Ika pada saat itu sedang off. 
7. Mengenai parkir , sebaiknya dari team FO menjelaskan aturan parkir yang berlaku di hotel. Karena informasi yang kami dapatkan sebelumnya dan pengalaman kami di hotel2 sebelumnya , bagi tamu yang menginap parkir adalah " FREE bagi tamu yang menginap" dan kendaraaan didaftarkan di concierge atau FO . In Fact , ketika kami tanya bagaimana untuk 2 mobil kami ttg fasilitas Parkir , Mr. Bram hanya melihat sekilas  mobil kami. Kami pun bertanya bagaimana untuk stempel atau kami dapat kartu untuk parkir tamu ??? Jawaban dari Mr. Bram " Tidak usah bu , itu akan ditangani oleh petugas parkir hotel" ... ( Okay, dalam hati tidak seperti biasanya seperti hotel2 lain, tapi karena kami sudah lelah , baiklah ) 
Dan apa yang kami prediksikan terjadi saat kami mau keluar dari hotel , driver kami ditarik uang parkir Rp. 42.000 1 malam , dan itu kami sangat kecewa , dan tidak ada pertanggungjawaban dari Pihak Management Hotel terutama Mr. Bram dan team " 
8. Untuk security lebih sopan dan tidak membedakan tamu yang datang baik yng membawa kendaraan atau tidak membawa kendaraan ( don't judge people from the cover ) , stylish belum tentu mempunyai uang banyak :) or kendaraan banyak juga yang sewa :) 
9. Makanan kurang bervariasi dan kurang pilihan menunya ....dan bumbu kurang berani 
9. Terima kasih kepada Ms. Ika atas bantuan dan diperkenalkannya Hotel ini , semoga ke depannya lebih baik lagi dan ada progress .
10. Terima kasih kepada Ms. Wila atas diperkenalkannya Hotel Ra Residence

text:
Fasilitas hotel yang sangat memuaskan tapi 3 kekecewaan saya :

1. Room service tiba2 masuk kamar saya tanpa ketuk pintu dan posisi saya baru selesai mandi hanya menggunakan celana dalam (sangat fatal)

2. Kali ke 2 saya menginap saya book langsung via telp dan diberi harga untuk 5hari 4 malam. Pagi-pagi saya menuju breakfast ternyata saya dikenakan charge 4 orang karena ternyata kamar saya tidak include breakfast (Kesalahan di resepsionis gak ngasi tau tanpa breakfast padahal saya gak beli kamar via booking online yang notabene booking online beri harga kamar include atau tidak include breakfast. Saya book langsung ke hotel)

3. Setelah saya mau checkout (menginap 5D4N) pembayaran menggunakan DEBIT CIMB NIAGA sebesar 7jt saya konfirmasi pada resepsionis dan rencana mengambil deposit saya senilai 1jt. Ada permasalahan lagi, ternyata saat saya payment pihak resepsionis menggesek kartu debit saya di mesin credit card BCA yang mengakibatkan pihak hotel harus konfirmasi pada bank BCA untuk mengembalikan uang 7jt dan apabila sudah masuk rekening saya, saya diminta transfer kembali ke pihak hotel dan sampai saat ini H+2 setelah saya checkout saya masih direpotkan karena harus terus cek mbanking dan harus kordinasi terus dengan pihak hotel setiap hari saya dihubungi pihak hotel. sangat mengganggu.

Jujur untuk fasilitas kamar dll sangat memuaskan hanya SDM di hotel yang sepertinya masih harus diperbaiki.
title: FATAL. 2x menginap 3x kekecewaan!

owner_response.text:
Selamat Siang Bapak Arya,

Salam Hangat dari Ra Residence,

Sebelumnya kami atas nama Manajemen mengucapkan Terima Kasih atas kepercayaan Bapak Arya menggunakan Ra Residence sebagai pilihan Utama untuk Akomodasi Bapak selama di Jakarta. 

Kami atas nama Manajemen Mohon Maaf yang sebesar-besarnya atas semua ketidaknyamanan yang terjadi selama Bapak menginap di Ra Residence. Adapun masukan dan komentar Bapak diatas kami anggap sebagai suatu masukan yang baik agar kedepan kami bisa lebih baik dalam meningkatkan pelayanan dan sumber daya manusia di Ra Residence. 

Sebagai informasi saja bahwa kami memang baru beroperasi dari bulan November 2015. sehingga sampai dengan bulan ini maka sudah hampir 6 bulan berjalan. Dengan waktu yang memang masih sangat singkat maka kami memang perlu peningkatan dan pembaharuan di semua sisi, baik itu fasilitas Residence dan Sumber Daya Manusia nya. 

Kami sungguh memahami kekecewaan yang Bapak Alami dan kami juga senantiasa harus memberikan pelayanan yang baik dan memuaskan untuk para tamu kami. 
Untuk kejadian yang Bapak sampaikan kami sudah menindak lanjuti dan mengambil langkah tegas terhadap SDM kami tersebut sesuai dengan aturan dan prosedur yang ada di Residence kami.
 
Dengan sangat hormat, saya atas nama Manajemen Ra Residence Jakarta Mohon maaf yang sebesar besarnya dan semoga kejadian tersebut tidak terulang kembali dan menjadikan kami lebih berhati-hati dalam bekerja dan  membuat kami lebih baik. 


Terima Kasih.

General Manager Ra Residence

text:
I choose this hotel for the price was the best one for my budget and because it's near Blok M square Mall as I the shop I wanted was there and it's not that far from the airport compared with the central hotels that would add much frustration with the traffic jam to reach the airport as the distance between the two from 45min to 1 hour. and I stayed for only for one night
.
The Pros:
* the room & all around the hotel was clean and new 
* the fridge won't affect when you take the key card out from the electricity main port for the room when you go out that will only work with the hotel card, some hotels need to do this
* the bed was really comfortable and the pillow was fluffy
* the room was really nice and clean
* all the staff was friendly & helpful , speak & understand English very well as it's a lil bit hard to find someone speak English and understand it very well in Jakarta 
* the elevator was really big and fast as I was in 12th floor 
* the hotel was really quiet as most of the customers was a businessmen for a conference or something
.
The Cons:
* The hotel entrance is in a small alley so you have to walk a bit to the main road to have a taxi and even that was a bit challenging as the taxi driver couldn't stop as the road was packed jam but I managed to have one after waiting for a 5 min under the sun to see another taxi and thank to Allah he saw me. But when I checked out I asked for a blue bird to the airport at 8:30 AM from the receptionist she helped me right away and the taxi arrived in a 5 to 8 min. this is not of an issue during the day but at night the alley is a bit dark
* I was shocked when I asked for a bucket of ice they charge 15000 Rp for it even it's not that expensive but all 4 and 5 stars hotels around the world asking for this service would be free
* they ask for 500000 Rp deposit and you have to pay it,and because I was in a budget this is really affect all my plans that I needed that money for. I lived in many other 4 stars hotels that asking for a deposit or you have the choice to pay at time by cash or credit card. so this was really inconvenient for me
* the water in the bathroom in the shower and the sink was OK but in the toilet was a bit yellow no matter how many time I flushed it BUT there was no funny or weird smells
* because the rooms not sound proofed you well hear everything even the sound of the flushed toilet from your neighbor 
* the breakfast was basic so don't expect so much even for a 4 stars hotel 
.
but all in all I had a good sleep before my flight as I only spent 8 hours from my 1 night stay and most of it I was sleep. and the hotel is convenient for 1 to 2 nights maximum in a budget
title: budget

text:
Staff are very friendly, helpful and humble, and that made my stay a pleasant experience. The restaurant staff went away and came back again just to deliver my copies of receipt as requested, after they delivered the food, without showing any annoyance. The maintenance staff also came multiple times to fix up the curtain and TV with patience.

There was house cleaning everyday and the makeup was quite consistent (especially the bed, it was made perfectly each time). One day I turned on the 'no disturb' switch and missed the house cleaning. The reception called twice to make sure that I still wanted the house cleaning, impressive.

My hotel package included four pieces of laundry cleaning everyday for free. It was a very helpful service and was greatly appreciated. Just inform the reception so the staff will pick up your laundry as requested. However, I was not sure whether to place the laundry in or outside the room. Clean and very nicely ironed laundry was placed on my bed the next day after the collection.

The room was generally clean and very tidy. There were always two towels, two bottles of mineral water and a new laundry bag ready for me everyday. There are a few places to improve:
- Cotton wool/pads were not refilled
- The room was not very soundproof. I could hear the noise of turning on a tap and shower next door/above
- TV remotes were not user-friendly
- Window blind was hard to manoeuvre hence the blind cord broke twice

It was handy to have a fridge and a microwave in the room. There was also a socket in the safe to charge the electronic goods.

The pool was nice and not too small. There was a massage pool next to the change rooms but it was not turned on at night. Floaties in the pool were really cute. Kids will love them even the adults I think. There were also a barbecue/family area, children's playground, slide and trampoline in the garden. The gym was small but well equipped. It had two treadmills, an elliptical machine, a strength machine, dumbbell and yoga mat. It also had a filtered water machine, towels and an air filter/conditioner to set the desired room temperature.

Food quality of the room service was average. Local cuisine on the menu was quite limited, given that it was a German restaurant. Breakfast was average too but not too bad. I could have the eggs cooked fresh in the way I liked. Coffee ordered at the bar was not inclusive of complimentary breakfast.

Hotel was really near to the office building that I worked in but because the back route was closed due to some constructions happening, I had to use the main road and always was stuck in the traffic. The side walk did not seem safe to me because there were too many bikes around. The hotel was opposite Citos (Cilandak Town Square) within walking distance via a pedestrian bridge. If you do not feel safe walking there alone, just inform the reception and a hotel security guard will walk you to/from the bridge. The hotel also provided free drop-off to Citos. Coming back, I recommend taking a taxi because it was way cheaper than ordering a hotel pickup (IDR35.000).

I love the fact that the hotel was trying their best to be sustainable, i.e. energy saving, using grey water for toilet flushing, no packaging for toiletries, and no change of bedsheets and towels unless indicated.
title: Very Friendly Staff!

text:
It was our first visit and most likely will not be the last time when visiting Simatupang' area.

Friendly and helpful staffs, clean and tidy bedroom, there's kitchen equiptments in the studio, but no utensils in the cupboards.

The glass swimming pool is nice, there's tiny one for children along with some cute floaties.

As for the food, we're not so sure because checking out very early for morning flight.

text:
My husband and I stayed at this hotel in July 2016. We were looking for an accommodation located near to our houses in South Jakarta, low to mid priced, considered new buildings. Ra Residence met our requirements.
- Location
Hotel is located across Cilandak Town Square so it is easy for those who want to visit the mall. You can take taxi which will cost around Rp 15,000 or if you do not mind dusts then you can do a 10-minute walk. Looking at the premises, we can say that it is a new complex. 
- Check in 
Check in was fast. Front desk requested for Rp 1 million as guarantee which was returned in cash when we checked out.
- Breakfast, Room Service, Restaurant
I cannot give any review on restaurant including breakfast since we opted for no breakfast scheme. We also didn't order anything from room service since they offer quite numerous non halal menus (just happened that my husband and I consider this as an important point).
- Housekeeping
We believe that housekeeping standard needs improvement since they kept giving us one towel instead of two towels. We stayed for four nights and we found it quite a hassle to request one additional towel every day. Yes, every day. Also there was one time when we were given one mineral bottle was given instead of two meanwhile when we checked in, we saw two mineral bottles.
- Lighting
We believe that Ra Residence applies "save energy policy"; looking at how the aisle is lit automatically when someone's presence is available in the aisle. This is a good initiative and not many hotels in Jakarta apply this. But at the same time, this initiative could be a surprise to some people who do not notice this "save energy policy" spirit especially in the evening because it took sometime for the lighting to light up (at least this happened on our floor).
- Room
We stayed at Studio Executive. Love the kitchen, not in love with the restroom since we think it's too small. Bed was okay and thickness was also okay. Do not like the idea of having two tv remote (one to turn on the tv, another for tv cable). Walls were quite thin. Hotel applies no smoking policy.
title: Good location, needs some improvement

text: We were at this hotel two times, once in June and another few days in July. The hotel is rather new and is owned by a German. That shows in the menu and in the naming of the restaurant. Otherwise the place is ok, on walking distance from the Citos Mall, and even closer to a supermarket with a lot of fresh food. The WIFI in the place is really good, also the fitness is fine. We were not so impressed by the breakfast, we thought Germans could do better. The really bad thing that happened was the second time we staid in a room on the 18th floor and there was a very bad stench coming out of the a.c. We told the reception about it, who said that they would send their technical team to check, but when we came back we noted that nothing was done and the stench of untreated sanitation was still coming out. Its brand new, just open. We had, together with some friends, the opportunity to stay there for one night and experience what it means to watch an opening. 
Because it is so new not everything would be working smoothly, we knew. And so a number of things happened or did not work right away. However, the staff, the waiters, the other service and technical people were not only willing to help but learned and reacted very fast. The rooms are nice and cozy, with beds you can really sleep in and don't feel ready for a new spine the next morning.  Fridge, oven and microwave, dishes, plates, cutlery and all you need were available and in good working condition. Bathroom has a shower with water coming out under pressure from high above. That's a special pleasure in Jakarta. Pool and gym for the health conscious, a room price good enough for the cost conscious, and a breakfast for your energy needs rounded the picture.

text:
My friend and I checked in to the Ra Simatupang Hotel a few days ahead of a wedding that we had flown in to attend. The airline had lost our luggage which was the grand finale in an extended series of unmitigated disasters caused by Qatar Airways and BA. Suffice it to say, we arrived tired and stressed. 

The staff at the hotel were kind, empathetic, and sincere - we were enormously thankful for their eagerness to help considering the shambolic service we had experienced with the airlines 48 hours prior. They made phone calls for us 2 to 3 times a day to help us locate our luggage and ensure that it was returned to us safely (which it eventually was). We were so grateful for their persistence on our behalf. 

Aside from that, the facilities at the hotel were all well-presented and clean - the restaurant had a relaxed atmosphere and the food was very pleasant. Overall I'm very pleased with my stay and would recommend the Ra Simatupang to anyone.
title: Friendly, helpful staff - outstanding customer service

text:
This will be an update of my previous review.
Mr. Arthur, the manager contacted me via Whats App after I went back to Canada. He confirmed that the deposit was 200 000 IDR, checked the CCTV and apparently the FO forgot to count the money and the day when I checked in, they found an extra 100 000 IDR at the end of the day. I'm still unsure why the FO said 300 000 IDR during check-in though. The FO also did not show me the deposit receipt before putting it inside the envelope, which is a common procedure in most hotels. From what I gathered, Widya was new on the job. It looks like there was a lack of on the job training for new staff? Regardless, I'm glad that Mr. Arthur came forward to clear everything. My brother said he got the money back and a free night voucher. This hotel seems to have many experienced mid-level manager, but also many new staff on the lower level. Hopefully, they can sort out the training for new staff soon. I understand that since the pandemic is ending, there's a rush of hiring new staff.

Old Review:
"Everything went well until checkout when I realized that the FO who checked me in, I think her name was Widya, STOLE MONEY from me. I paid my accommodation in full through Amex Travel Canada - Expedia. During check-in, the FO asked for a deposit of 300 000 IDR and she gave me a receipt. I was with my brother and he also remember that it was 300 000 IDR. I was being naive and didn’t check what was written, which is a big no no since even hotel staff here is predatory. During checkout, I found out that the FO wrote 200 000 IDR on the receipt, not 300 000 IDR. A clear case of deception, dishonest, and corrupt behavior. So, I only get 200 000 IDR deposit back. I will never return to this hotel. It was cheap for a reason. 100 000 IDR is not much. This isn’t about the money, but the experience. How can I trust the RA brand when this is the experience that I get when I tried one of their hotel. This dishonest, deceptive and corrupt action done by the Front Desk left a bad experience for me. RA Simatupang, THANKS for your EXCELLENT hospitality."
title: Thanks, Mr. Arthur!

text:
Went to this hotel for my wife’s birthday. I booked their Executive Suite room for 2D1N with breakfast.

The room was soooo spacious! You will get a kitchen, a living area, two bathrooms (one with a shower and bathtub), and a bedroom. I am honestly surprised that it would be THAT spacious. You may want to confirm if the bathtub is available for your room though, because it is limited to certain number of Executive Suite rooms.

The pool is also great, but unfortunately there is no indoor shower, so you may want to immediately go to your room to shower after swimming if you are wearing hijab. They also have the gym but it is not their main points.

The breakfast? They covered a lot of cuisines such as Indonesian, Western, and Indian. I’ve eaten at their restaurant before, it is called Layana. I have to say that their Nasi Goreng Buntut is top notch, you should give it a try.

Also, after you checkout, you can try their cafe, it is called Rumangsa. They have some good sandwiches and cakes. Their tuna and chicken sandwiches are my favorite.

Sorry, didn’t take many photos. I was busy enjoying my stay 😆
title: One of the best family-friendly hotel in South Jakarta

title: Good Job

text: Nice ambient and good staff.. Very friendly.. What I like about this place is very homey..fair food..Hopefully new place such as Ra Suite will be another good place to hang out wit friends and family.. A great place.. Very recommended.
title: 25th Avenue

text: RA Premier Simatupang is one of the best Hotel we have come across for cleanliness, hygiene, staff support, the Manager is very proactive and immediately fix and attend to all gust concerns. If anyone looking for a stay in Jakarta this is a must recommended Hotel, hassle-free stay. Even for pure vegetarians this Hotel can provide suitable cruise ..special thanks to Ms. Cahya who is in charge of restaurant, for her proactive and sincere effort towards guest satisfaction and making our stay very pleasant by providing the suitable diet.
title: This hotel staff and service is outstanding

text:
The Pros - hassle free check in (apparently, you need to pay IDR500k deposit, paid by cash or CC, no debit), service ok, friendly and helpful staffs, in room service available (bakery and resto - can be ordered via WhatsApp, can be paid by cash or debit - which was super convenient!!), food was nice, location ok - walking distance from Citos, go green concept, comfy bed and superfluffy pillow, I didn't swim but they said the swimming pool open 24 hours (at your own risk as there is no lifeguard), wifi connection was pretty good.  

The Cons - it was a bit below my expectation tbh. I was planning to cook my own meal so I bought some stuff from home. But apparently, the mini kitchen & cooking utensils were no longer available in the room - stove, sink, toaster, microwave, cutlery, all gone. We only got thermos for hot water, tea, coffee, mineral water, cups, and fridge. Thankfully there's a freezer in the fridge so I can store my ingredients (that I couldn't use). I highly suggest the management to update the hotel photos and details on travel sites cuz I don't think it's fair for guests/customers. Idk if it was just in my room type or they have actually removed the mini kitchen from all rooms (bear this in mind if you're planning to have a long stay and cook your own meal). Idk what happen with those stains in the huge mirror, no towel in the room (need to ask FO, and they only have large towel, no small/face towel, and they also don't have small towel as bathroom mat/rug, so the bathroom is always wet after I showered or wudhu, the water in the toilet was a bit brownish (but no funny or bad smells, though), not much channel options on TV (it even sometimes lost signal a couple of times so you can't watch anything for a while), there was loud music on Sunday morning until noon when I stayed (I was on the 5th fl) - not sure if there was an event or anything but it was quite annoying & disturbing
title: was an ok stay

text: The room was really spacious, very good value for money. However the bathroom construction was rather bad, the floor has a small slope in the middle that prevents the water to go out through the drain. The staffs were exceptional, everyone were really helpful. Thumbs up for everyone from the concierge, lounge/bakery, doorman, security, and housekeeping. Really like the gelato that they were selling, feeling regret because I only tried them at the last day. Limited elevator capacity, sometimes we might have to wait for awhile on busy hours
title: The staffs were amazing

text:
okay for quick getaway.
The facilities and the rooms are very good and clean.
Need more improvements in parking area.
Hotel foods are delicious and reasonably priced.  
The pool and fitness area fits the descriptions.
title: okay for quick getaway

text:
RA Premiere Simatupang has been our "2nd house" if I may say..♥️😊  We frequently stay there even only for a staycation.. The ambience, facilities, and the cleanliness always satisfying us.. Our last time was a super pleasant stay on Dec 2021 due to my boy's bday..🎉 We booked  the RA Executive Suite Room and all at its best..

Special thanks to Ms. Neva (Guest Relation Ofc. ) who helped us a lot..🙏🏻🙏🏻  to the "big portion" of the Strawberry Cheese Cake as the Bday cake compliment 🍰  and the Gelatos 🍨🍨 which were super yummmyyy..🤩👍🏻

Keep up the good works, RA Premiere Simatupang, definetely we will come back again and again..👌🏻☺️
title: A Super Pleasant Stay

text:
Decided to booked a room for a weekdays staycation with my friends. Arrived at the hotel around 5 PM, with a good protocol applied. Checkin process was smooth handle by Shindy at reception. Got a high floor room at 17 floor with a great south Jakarta’s view. 

Room was very spacious and clean. The most important, the room provided with a nice kitchen set, water dispenser, fridge, electric oven. They also provided a table ware with a complete cutlery set. 

Also thank to Neva and Dila for the cute room decoration surprise and the red velvet cake, surprisingly it’s super delicious! 

Glad to know that they can extended my checkout time on the next day. What great hospitality service! Have a chance to meet with the manager upon my departure, if I am not mistaken the name of the lady is Mrs. Elmi. She is very kind. 

Overall services was excellent! I really recommend this property for anyone who are looking for a hotel with a apartment facilities in South Jakarta area, really worth the price. 

Kudos for RA premire for a great hospitality service, especially for the FO team. 

Will be back soon!
title: Excellent stay!

text: love the hospitality and the service , the food and the room is excellent , they have a pool , gym , jacuzzi , meeting room . is a great place to stay with family or friends. the hotel is near to mall and have a shuttle bus to the mall , for me is a must try hotel
title: Stay cation in re-simatupang

text: The Ra residence hotel have a great hospitality, delicious food, and a lot of promotions. And also the gym open for 24 hours even i didn't have a chance to try it when i stayed there but i will try for the next visit. Hope the hotel will always keep the quality in every aspects and also improve it for the better experience. Thank you very much
title: Guest Experience

text: What an amazing experience! The staff are so friendly and so helpful. Strick health screening protocol and i love it. I stayed with my family here and we are so happy with the clean room and delicious food. Affordable price. Thank you! 100% will come again.
title: Staycation Cilandak

text: excellent service, absolute 100/100 for hospitality. the room is marvelously luxurious yet affordable. a perfect place for staycation and friendly getaway. i respectfully admire the ambience, the style, the cleanliness, the facilities, and (most importantly) the breakfast buffet. i definitely will recommend Ra Premiere to my close people, and i would personally come again any other time in the future. keep it up!
title: One Way Getaway For A Day

text:
This place is amazing. We love the Premier room. Proper kitchenette, with the cutleries as well.
Small window, but I guess it's fine.

Since there's a new health protocols about hotel dining, so we didn't take the breakfast, however, my wife like the bread at their coffee shop.

A bit hic up on the wifi, we often lost the signal.

But hey, we'll be back for sure.
title: StayCation Above and Beyond

text:
I have stayed in numerous hotels in Jakarta, and each time, I have enjoyed my stays, but for some reason, the Ra Simatupang eluded me.....but not this time, and thank god I found it. What a fantastic place to stay. From the front desk staff to housekeeping and the catering / restaurant personnel, I have rarely seen such a consistently good service. 

The room was spacious, clean and modern, and with the kitchenette I was able to choose between making my own meals, or ordering from room service. 

If you are looking for a great place to stay, at a reasonable price, look no further. 

Ra Team, thank you for everything and you will be seeing me back very soon!
title: Ra Premiere by name, and Premier by quality

text: it's not a big hotel but very comfy and clean. They have pools, nice cafe and coffee shop at lobby. Good Wifi, and more over they have pantry and kitchen. It's a good place for long stay nest at south Jakarta.
title: Coozy Place to stay

text: I've stayed 4 times in this hotel during the pandemic and always satisfied with the condition and cleanliness of the room. I've stayed in the executive suite room, with the separate bedroom and livingroom, and also in studio executive. And i feel both are really good for the money.
title: Really good hotel for the price

text: Very hommie and nice room. Good service and delicious breakfast. The staff was very kind and room service was available 24hrs. Kids were happy but unfortunately we have not tried the pool yet. Surely will come back.

text: Experiencing to stay here several times. I was here for business and in executive suite room. The best of this hotel is about spacious room and full furnished kitchen and kitchenette just like home. I could prepare the food for myself which is more preferable during pandemi. text: Due to pandemy i was assured that the room has been safely disinfectant prior to my arrival.the new menu of mie goreng jawa has become my new favourite. looking forward to the opening of new format resto in the hotel.

text:
We had a really nice stay at RA. As we were self quarantined, room service was delivered for breakfast, lunch and dinner. As we are both vegan the cook made us delicious plantbased meals with a lot of variation. Also the rest of the service was wonderful. 

The location is allright, though near a big road which is quit loud if you are at the pool.
title: Nice stay

text:
WORST EXPERIENCE ! Nothing’s went well!

1. Long wait when check in. We checked in at 2pm but we waited for 1 hour to get our room ready!

2. BAD internet connection. The wifi speed is so frustrating. We stayed in executive suite rooms at 7th floor and the wifi connection is very poor. Even for Telkomsel signal is just 1 bar here.

3. THE FRONT OFFICE NUMBER IS SO DIFFICULT TO BE REACHED! I’m requesting an additional towel and I have to tell them 3 TIMES WITH OVER THAN 5 ATTEMPT TO CALL! My friends decided to goes down to the receptionist for req additional towel but they still didn’t give FAST ACTION! This is so frustrating. 

4. The electrical is totally disgusting. In the morning we are using stove and microwave but the electrical insufficient ! The electrical down for more than 3 times! You need to prepare higher voltage to avoid electrical down!! 

A VERY DISAPPOINTED SERVICE AND WOULDNT BE COMING BACK HERE EVEN THEY HAVE PROMOS!
title: Terrible

text: A Beautiful Hotel, start from my arrival, greeted happy birthday to me😍  by the friendliness of the hotel staff. Really had greatest time with the most loving friends here. Cozy place, great service, and what a beautiful pool. Covid protocol perfectly done, the room was very clean, and they sent me a beautiful noted happy birthday wowww made my heart more happier at that night. They have Rumangsa Coffee at the lobby floor, the coffee was really good and quite cheap, I love it. Thankyou very much Ra Simatupang what a happiest ever staycation. Thankyou so so much to Ibu Amanda and team for your nice and honest hospitality. I definitely recommend Ra Simatupang and will come back again soon💋

text: Great experience. The suite room (3 bedrooms) are amazing, service are quite nice and informative. The swimming pool is  and photogenic, it also had sitting area beside pool. They also had kids pool and outdoor playground. Breakfast in room is average, we only had bento breakfast (american breakfast in bento box) the sausage was not really good. But overall fine.
title: New Normal Staycation

text:
Whenever I stayed at RA , I’ve encountered difficulties in getting clear and stable tv programs.  It’s quite frustrating, as the tv will freeze or has nothing on the screen for sometimes or few minutes until it willl appear and breaking ups .. i’ve learned that i have to restart the set up box, instead of calling hskp each time to assist .. perhaps you may need yo change the tv cable provider.

Also in some suite rooms I stayed , tv is not available in the bedroom , and only available 1tv at the living room .. so perhaps you need to ensure the room readiness and it’s facilities consistancy. 

Thanks .. 

I look forward to staying at RA again in the near future ..
title: TV programs

text: i had a great staycation with a superb comfort room and helpful staffs especially to Ms. Anya. The check in process was so fast and the staffs was really helpful and so nice. All the things was so great and would like to come back to this hotel for another amazing staycation.

i booked executive room and it was very decent and comfy and spacious, i love it!

text:

Outstanding people with a great attitude, always smiling and trying to help the guests don't matter the time of the day/night.

text:
it is nice & homie to stay in Ra simatupang, the hotel situated is closed by the office building along busy road Simatupang, 

the price is competitive & the staff is friendly, they provided shuttle bus to the office building nearby 

the 3 bed room residemxe is so affordable and noce place to stay
title: Mr

text: Great rooms and amenities. Very pleasant and helpful staff, especially Ms. Herryn Paays. Close to a lot of businesses relevant to my line of work and not too far away from Kemang, which is a great area to go out. I am staying at Ra about 1-2 weeks each month.
title: Great hotel in Simatupang Area

text: Perfect service, friendly atmosphere, cleanly, interesting view on Tower Square, helpful staff, reasonable price. small kitchen with fridge, desk on each floor sunny balcony, complete satisfaction. Thank you. See you again...
title: complete satisfaction

text: My husband and I stayed in RA for almost a year and we highly recommend this place! Aside from the great facilities (comparable to 4-star hotels), what we Love most about this place is the fact that everyone is friendly! The staff (from the guest Relations officers to housekeeping) is well trained and they are all so nice and helpful. During our stay the whole place became a home, and the people became family. There is free coffee and tea served in the lobby all day long, and many areas where you can stay in when you want to work on something. There is a small gym and a pool. There is also a restaurant named Koi connected to RA (the waiters are all so kind there as well!). They serve some good Indonesian and Western food. Location of RA is okay, it’s across Cilandak Town Square (area where there are many restaurants and a grocery), and very near All Fresh (another Grocery). Fairly easy to go around Jakarta because it’s easily accessible by Grab or GoCar. Overall rating is 11/10. Thank you, RA!
title: Home away from home

text:
Last month I was for about 1 week , the service was excellent , friendly and very nice, they greeted me very polite eventhough sometimes I looked shabby (which in some hotels they judge you from what you wear, if you're a woman you will know that 😉) 
Very helpful staff! I had no idea that this hotel could be such a very nice one since the location not really in a mainstreet, just close by. Definitely will stay again next year!!
title: Great hotel!

text: The staff is helpful and friendly, especially the shuttle driver. Have been staying there for almost two weeks, the place and location is just nice as Citose is nearby. Besides, by walking distance there is All fresh hyper market so convenience for the resident in case we need to buy any daily product.
title: Very relaxing stay

text: Spacious room, got upgraded to executive suites, neat and clean with comfortable ambiance. Quiet environment, perfect for a short getaway. Excellent and fast service, for sure will be back with more memorable getaway.
title: Short Staycation

text:
This is the first time I checked in, I hope to be comfortable.  however the rooms are not soundproof, and we cannot enjoy television shows due to problems for more than 4 hours, and there is no notification from the hotel, trying to use the ezcast wifi application is slow ... as a result my family and I tried to force sleep because there was nothing we could  do it

Regards,
Segara
title: Internet and TV Problem

text:
Ra Premiere Simatupang Hotel is quiet new hotel. It is located in the business district in South Jakarta, which I could say it is having a good advantage because it is nearby shopping malls, golf courses and some of International schools.
 The staffs are friendly and helpful. The room is clean, equipped with flat screen TV and spacious. Ra Simatupang offers you from a studio to deluxe room to range of 1, 2 & 3 bedroom suites have either a pantry or kitchen. 
 Ra Simatupang hotel is supported by KOI restaurant group in ground floor. KOI restaurant is one of my favorite restaurant in Jakarta, and it does serve well in Ra. Ra Simatupang also offers a salt water swimming pool, fitness center and childres playground. Ra simatupang has a number of excellent meeting rooms and board room with a free wifi.
 Over all, Ra Premiere Simatupang is a good hotel to stay, comfort and good place to move your corporate meetings. Enjoy!
title: Good Stay. Comfort Hotel.

text: Very nice service, and very friendly and helpful staff. They have complete facility, and very good restaurant. Also, I like the idea of recycling water for toilet. But sometimes the room abit dirty and have some ants in the corner.
title: Nice service!

text: This place its awsome, best facilities, best room. The important thing for me is the staffs, they all so kind and very helpfull :). Nice pools, good restaurant, near from Malls, nice hotel buildings...
title: Best Experience

text: Had the pleasure of staying at RA whilst in Jakarta on business. Stayed for three weeks and really enjoyed . The staff are all friendly and go out of their way to assist you . The rooms are spacious, clean and very practical . I would recommend this place to anyone staying in the south Jakarta area.
title: Great stay just like home

text:
Verry good and nice hotel studio... i will back again. I can cooking.. the room so clean, no noisy, they have a good security...

Near from the last station of MRT (lebak bulus)
Front of us is Citos mall ( cilandak town square)
title: First time going to south jakarta

text:
Hotel location is very easy, close to main road Tb Simatupang,also walking distance to Citos.

Lobby is cozy,minimalized but comfortable with welcome drink ready for you.

The staff, start from entrance gate, door man,FO,very well trained with big smile on their face for welcoming and assisting you.
HK staff also really good,they will provide your request (Im asking extra towe & extra hanger)immediately without any excuse.

Room is amazing,spacious,clean,with work table,kitchen equipment,and sofa bed.Also in each floor they have sunset balcony for smoking area (this hotel have no smoking policy in all room which is really great).

Hotel facility (outdoor pool, jacuzzi, playground, game room, gym ) is wonderful. My daughter really enjoyed.

I have to mention Rifda & Bina from reception is very effective.Check in time less than 3 minutes,I can get my room directly.Security guard,Mr Wito, Mr Dwi, & Mr Sunandar really helpful assist parking spot for me,because at that time this hotel is busy.

Definetely will comeback again,soon.

HIGHLY RECOMMENDED FOR FAMILY STAYCATION AND BUSINESS PURPOSE!!!

Thank You for wonderful experiences for me & family.Keep the good work.
title: AMAZING STAYCATION!!

text:
Ra Simatupang Residences are located about 1 block off the west bound side of Simatupang between Antasari and Fatmawati. For a great price you get a small apartment rather than a hotel room. 

We rented a 2 BR, 2 bath unit with a fully furnished kitchen. Our unit also had a washer/dryer. 

Everything was clean and in good working order. 

They have a nice pool. 

The restaurant was surprisingly good. 

Ra Simatupang is not opulent. It is, however, a very functional and a comfortable place to stay. 

You will have a difficult time finding better value for money in this part of Jakarta.
title: Spacious Clean Rooms at Great Price!

text: Had a great 3 week stay at Ra simatupang. Breakfast and one time shuttle to office was complimentary. Food at the hotel restaurant is really good. Plus there are ton of restaurants within the walking distance of the hotel. The staff is super friendly and go extra mile to make your stay comfortable. They even got me a samosa as I was craving for it! The hotel arranged for a complimentary one day trip in jakarta, which included trip to 2 museums and all the meals were paid for too. Definitely recommend staying at Ra Simatupang. Don't have any second thoughts.
title: Great hotel, super hospitable staff

text:
Tremendous value for money and excellent location in Jakarta Business District, just minutes from Cilandak Town Square
On arrival there is a selection of complimentary drinks that changes daily - iced tea, dragon fruit juice and lemon infused water on my arrival - which came in very handy. Friendly staff, who speak English well.
The room was bigger than I expected, with good amenities (incl. cook-top and microwave). Air con works well, even though it took a little longer than I would've like to get to my desired temperature. My 12th floor room had great views of Jakarta, as did the lift lobby. Large comfortable bed, complimentary WiFi and bottled water.
The bar, to the right of reception, is a quiet and relaxing place for a drink, with a nearby pool area.
Wouldn't hesitate to stay again.
title: Enjoyable overnight stay

owner_response.text:
Dear Sir/Madam

Thank you for sharing your memorable experience at Ra Simatupang on TripAdvisor.

We are more than happy to read that you enjoy our facilities and services. Your compliments are truly appreciated. Also, It's such an honor to know that you will recommend us to your friends and family. 

Once again, thank you for sharing your review on TripAdvisor. We are looking forward to welcoming you again at Ra Simatupang on your next visit.

Warmest regards,
Daphne Canti Angella

text:

title: over all stay in Ra Residence for about 65 days was good - Gnanam .T

text: This is by far, one of the best accommodations in Jakarta. I appreciate the high level and service-oriented nature of the security officers. The counter staff are alright too. They speak English. The swimming pool is chic and has two large floats for kids. The rooms are very comfortable and the hotel overall is well maintained. I have been staying here for the last 3 years every time I am in the South of Jakarta. The only down side is that there is hardly a convenience store nearby although there is a supermarket within 200m you can walk to.
title: Excellent Accommodation in Jakarta

text: The facility hotel is very good and every room got more facility then other hotel like kitchen set with tableware, and outside facility swimming pool and gym are also children play ground and small garden
title: Meeting at confortable hotel

text:
Spent weekend with family in 3 bedded unit residence. You can feel the warm hospitality even before you enter the room. The lobby is cozy 
The room is definitely above expectation. Spacious yet intimate. Everything from living room, kitchen to sleeping room are nicely designed and functional. Combine with excellent service and staff, this hotel may become main option to spend time with family. Will definitely come back. Big thanks to all staff...
title: Great hotel with great value

text:
i decide to stay at Ra Simatupang after making comparation with 3 different hotel in that area. i'm so glad finally i pick Ra Simatupang.
1. Access : location on jalan intan just beyond simatupang street. jalan intan is just a small road, so not it's not as busy as simatupang, but still have an easy access.
2. Lobby and reception : lobby is nice, big and spacious with a lot of comfy sofas and free flow welcome drink. check in was a breeze, Mr Sidik offer me to upgrade may room to 2 Bedroom unit with reasonable price. the process was smooth although it' s already late in the evening
3. the rooms : well i really impressed with the unit. it's sparkling clean, all the utilities are functioning well and on the good condition. it's really comfortable, worth every rupiah i spent here. they have a kitchen and all the utilities and washing machine in the unit.

too bad i didn't have time to eat at Koi Resto downstairs. 

one minus is only the parking space, because it a bit tight and not too easy to make manouvre esp if you drive a big car.

other than that everything is just right.
title: beyond my expectation

text:
Stayed here yesterday with my little family , totally didn't have any expectation but when we came there, lobby was clean and cozy, cold welcome drink always available, friendly staff and very helpful, the corridors are clean and they are pretty environmentally friendly where they use the recycle water for flushing ( this i'm not sure about the color if you guys can do something about it ? but it's a good start ) , 
swimming pools are clean and in the ok size, whirpool, a little playground for kids, and they have KOI restaurant downstairs which is one of my fav resto, so i couldn't ask more . If you ask me about the room? it's a well designed studio , they have cooking utensils and stuff, very clean, i can let my 1 year old crawling around without any worries. Thank you Ra Residence !
title: if tripadvisor has 6 stars i'll definitely rate for 6 !

text:
Location: Is a little far away from the city but I chose this place as it is only 7 mins drive away from my client's place which I needed to go for the 11 days I stayed in Ra Simatupang.

Room: Very nice and spacious! It is very clean also! Love my room a lot! Highly recommended!

Hotel staff: This hotel has one of the best team of hotel staff! Friendly, approachable and nice. I enjoyed my stay in Ra Simatupang partly because of them too! They made you feel very welcomed. Want to special shoutout to this staff, Elan, for being there to help me out during my stay in Ra as I'm not a local. Truly grateful to him and the team!

Breakfast: Nice food and big portion. But would be good if they do not restrict to one meal per guest! 

Overall, I love Ra Simatupang! Highly recommended

text:
I started to use these appartments for my usual weekends in jkt, as I live/work in bekasi during the week, and am gladly surprised.
Clean, modern, excellent service, nice rooms, nice pool, charming staff, good quality restaurant, nice tv, views. I really enjoy the “deal of the day” offer for the suite. For a decent price it allows me to enjoy a much bigger room. So unless they change this offer, I intend to come very often.

text:
We greatly enjoyed our 5 night stay here. The staff are all super friendly and so helpful, from front office staff, security to housekeeping. The hotel is well maintained (extensive cleaning of the lobby at night). The atmosphere is very friendly and relaxed. 
I would prefer to stay here for a business trip just because of the atmosphere and friendly service.

The Citro mall opposite the hotel has plenty of choices for food. We also enjoyed the food in the Koi restaurant.
title: Great short stay with family

text:
Have spent last five months staying multiple times in this hotel. This is a new build hotel and well located on South Circular road across busy highway from the well known CITOS shopping/food mall and Talavera building. They are lucky to also have a pedestrian walkway between hotel and CITOS.  Hotel staff are very very good, some not the most experienced but very willing to assist and nothing is a problem.The management are low profile but you can tell they are watching everything. The restaurant is managed by independent co. Koi. Food is good but as I have stayed for 5 months now it badly needs and change. Breakfast is good, they have lunch and afternoon tea promotions which seem well priced. Dinner is ok.

Rooms are compact, modern and clean.  Office desk and chair are good as is all the necessary power and cable points. Cable/internet tv is provided but choices are limited. I prefer the side of the hotel away from a nearby mosque so the call for prayer at 04.20 is not quite as loud!

Hotel provides shuttle vehicles to all local offices nearby (which is very useful) and they also provide all workout gear incl. shoes if you want a session in the gym!

All in all a nice modern, well priced hotel, well located in the South side of the city with hard working and helpful staff and a decent restaurant. A great choice for professionals during weekdays and families and couples at the weekend. Thanks to all at Ra Residence for your tireless work. :)
title: Friendly and Professional

text:
As this was a business trip, there is not much I can say about the hotel’s general locality, other than it was close to the office building that I was visiting. There is a pretty big Cilandak Town Square shopping mall within 10min walk from the hotel where there are a lot of restaurants, retail/departmental stores and supermarket. Public transport is not readily available within the vicinity, so your best bet of moving around would be taxi.

The hotel is nestled in some small streets just off the main freeway, thus avoiding the noise from the traffic. The hotel lobby was well appointed and felt welcoming, so was the restaurant/bar beside the lobby (more on that later).  The Deluxe Studio room I checked in was spacious, clean and functional. There is a small kitchenette in the room as well!! For the business travelers, it is very useful to have a working desk as well as zippy in-room WiFi. The room was tastefully decorated, the bed was comfortable, and the bathroom is spacious with the shower separated from the toilet, all-in-all making it a very comfortable stay.

If you have the choice, do include their breakfast in your room package. The hotel restaurant/bar was pleasant and has a nice ambience. Apart from the few staples (such as bread, fruits and salad) spread out as buffet, you get to choose your breakfast main from their menu which are mostly very scrumptious and very deliciously done – such a great way to start your day.

If just so happens you need to be in that part of the city, I think you can’t go wrong with this hotel. Coupled with the hotel rate (at least the corporate rate) which was rather good value, I would definitely look forward to staying here if ever I need to visit Jakarta again.
title: Very decent hotel

I called Ra to ask if there are 10 plates available in the kitchenette, the receptionist forward my call to sales representative at that time. She answered my question by asking from where did i book the 2 bedroom. It was from Traveloka. Then she explained to me that the rooms provided through Traveloka were for promotional intentional only and that's why it came with cheaper prices, and that in the future Ra Residence will specifically aim foreigners guests who wish to stay long term. I confused why she gave such reply. And then she said that they could provide me with four plates. 
I have stayed in many places, and it wasn't an answer i expect from a hotel sales. Haven't been back since then.
FYI, you could still book Ra Residence through Traveloka, and other online travel agent if you wish.

Ho vissuto in questo Hotel 9 mesi per lavoro. Camera comoda e ampia, zona notte divisa da zona giorno con cucina e due bagni. Servizio di pulizie e lavanderia. Hotel ben tenuto, pulito con piscina, ristorante e bar con musica dal vivo 5 sere a settimana.
Fiore all’occhiello è sicuramente lo staff: gentile, premuroso, accogliente, presente e sempre disponibile a scambiare due chiacchiere: ti fanno sentire a casa. Un ringraziamento a Inda, Dhea, Tabby, Sika, Edho, Made, Edwan e tutto i loro colleghi.🙏,
title: Comodità e ospitalità

text:
Sono stato in molti hotel in giro per il mondo, Europe, Middle East, Russia, Africa e adesso qui in Indonesia dove non ero mai stato prima. Dopo quasi 6 mesi di permanenza presso questo hotel, posso assolutamente dire che il RA Simatungpang gode di un privilegio che nessuna catena a mille stelle probabilmente avrà mai. Tutto lo staff é indiscutibilmente il più attento ai dettagli che abbia mai trovato. Non mi riferisco ai soliti dettagli, che comunque rientrano nella normale gestione di ogni attività aperta al pubblico e che ovviamente ci sono anche al RA Simatungpang, io parlo dei dettagli che ti fanno stare bene, quei dettagli che trovi solo a casa tua. Insomma, lo staff del RA é una vera squadra, una di quelle squadre capaci di coinvolgerti e farti partecipe della loro quotidianitá. È una qualitá rara. 
Promuovo tutto lo staff a pieni voti, Inda, Dhea, Sikha, Tabby, Edo, Noni, the Twins, the breakfast chef, Made, Talitha, Taga, e comunque anche tutti gli altri che non ho nominato solo perché fatico a memorizzare i nomi. Se capitate da queste parti di Jakarta, il RA é il posto lontano da casa vostra che vi fará dimenticare le distanze.
title: Bellissima esperienza

text: Dit recente hotel is een uitstekende prijs-kwaliteit keuze. Hun ecologisch 15-punten programma is geniaal gevonden en een voorbeeld voor ALLE hotels. Zeer netjes, perfect schoon en een absolute aanrader. in tegenstelling tot het optionele ontbijt in het aanpalende KOi restaurant. Met Rp 185.000 (ong. € 15) is zijn geld niet waard. Amper keuze en een bedroevende kwaliteit. Zeer goeie ligging tegenover CITOS mall, een aangename eet- en drinkgelegenheid. Zeker langs gaan voor een koffie of eender welke maaltijd.

text:
一番気に入ったポイントは、立地！　新しいホテルなのに、意外とタクシーの運ちゃんは知っていましたよ。SimatupangのAll Fresh手前を左折すれば、ホテルの入り口が左側にあります。万が一通り過ぎたら、突き当りを左折してKOIレストラン前でおろしてもらいましょう。レストランを通ってホテルに入れます。

1階にKOIレストランが入っていたのが嬉しかったです。わざわざKemangやBlok Mへ行かなくても、十分食事が楽しめます。朝食はこのKOIレストランでアラカルトで注文することもできます。部屋にミニキッチンも付いているので、Simatupang沿いにあるAll Freshでサラダとパンを買って食べればもっとお得。チトスにも歩道橋を渡って歩いて行けます。便利です。

部屋でのお気に入りポイントは机が大きかったこと。ミニキッチンがついていたこと。

部屋の窓が小さく、窓から向かいのオフィスビルの人が見えました。ちょうどベッドに横になると見える位置だったので、微妙でした。
トイレの水は再利用されているとのことですが、茶色なのはどうでしょうか。
以上二点が気になったので評価は四つ星です。
title: 長期滞在にも向いています

text: 部屋は綺麗で、フロントの対応もよかったです。但し、部屋のＴＶが映りませんでした。また、朝食はビュッフェではなく、3種類くらいから選ぶ方式でした。ロケーションとしては、ごちゃごちゃした道の面しているので、ちょっとわかりつらいかも知れません。
title: フロントの対応が良い
